=======
History
=======

0.1.0 (2020-04-23)
------------------

* First release on PyPI.

0.3.0 (2020-04-25)
-------------------
* RPC feature implemented
* use pickle instead of json for serialization for better performance. Currently protocol 4 is used.

0.4.0 (2020-04-30)
-------------------
* Change signature of `Remote.execute` to `Remote.invoke`
